alert.note: Alert for Clay; Leslie; Perry (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 3:26PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Leslie, central Perry and east central Clay Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 325 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Lamont to Thousandsticks to Hector. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Thousandsticks, Hosea, Krypton, Dryhill, Mosley Bend and Toulouse around 330 PM EDT. Hyden around 340 PM EDT. Hazard around 345 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Wendover, Stinnett, Wooton, Avawam, Bulan, Hoskinston, Cinda, Diablock, Spring Creek, Smilax, Cutshin, Causey, Jeff, Essie, Big Fork and Viper. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
